    <div id="content">
     <div id="contentleft" style="width:230px;">
      <div id="leftboxes">
       <div id="wrapbox17497883">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="17497883">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title17497883">
          <div class="bi_text">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Need help with your research?
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_1" id="content17497883">
          <p>
          </p>
          <p>
           <em>
            Contact:
           </em>
           <br />
           <br />
           <a href="mailto:kcannon@muhlenberg.edu">
            Kelly Cannon
           </a>
           <br />
           Outreach and Scholarly
           <br />
           Communication Librarian,
           <br />
           Humanities &amp; Business
           <br />
           Subject Specialist
           <br />
           <br />
           phone: 484-664-3602
           <br />
           email:
           <a href="mailto:kcannon@muhlenberg.edu">
            kcannon@muhlenberg.edu
           </a>
           <br />
           <br />
          </p>
          <div id="boxatt17497883" class="boxatt">
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
     <div id="contentcenter" style="width:520px;padding-left:0px; margin-left:0px; margin-right:8px; float:left;">
      <div id="centerboxes">
       <div id="wrapbox17497884">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="17497884">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title17497884">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Reference Works
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content17497884">
          <div id="boxatt17497884" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link20585616">
              <a id="link_20585616" href="http://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.credoreference.com" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20585616,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'The Reformation', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 18508858}); ">
               Credo Reference
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Hundreds of authoritative dictionaries, encyclopedias, fact books, guides, companions and more from respected publishers across dozens of major subject areas.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link20585717">
              <a id="link_20585717" href="https://muhlenberg.on.worldcat.org/oclc/32859680?databaseList=1708,638" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20585717,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'The Reformation', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 20585717}); ">
               Oxford Encyclopedia of the Reformation
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               The Oxford Encyclopedia of the Reformation is the definitive source for information about the entire range of religious and social changes that altered the face of Europe in the sixteenth century, encompassing not only issues of church polity and theology but also developments in politics, economics, demographics, art and literature. This broadly cast, interdisciplinary definition allows for a comprehensive social and intellectual history of early modern Europe.
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox17497885">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="17497885">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title17497885">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Books: Primary and Secondary Works
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content17497885">
          <div id="boxatt17497885" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link20585766">
              <a id="link_20585766" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://eebo.chadwyck.com/home" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20585766,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'The Reformation', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12717132}); ">
               Early English Books Online
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Digital facsimile page images of virtually every work printed in England, Ireland, Scotland, Wales and British North America and works in English printed elsewhere from 1473-1700.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link20585618">
              <a id="link_20585618" href="http://muhlenberg.on.worldcat.org/advancedsearch" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20585618,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'The Reformation', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 18508793}); ">
               Encompass Search
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Encompass Search searches for books and other resources, first in our own library, and then beyond, in other research libraries.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link20585760">
              <a id="link_20585760" href="http://books.google.com" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20585760,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'The Reformation', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 20006208}); ">
               Google Books
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               An excellent source for full-text of primary documents as they appear in public domain (pre-1923) books and magazines.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link20585617">
              <a id="link_20585617" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://newfirstsearch.oclc.org/done=http://trexler.muhlenberg.edu//;dbname=worldcat;fsip" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20585617,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'The Reformation', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12728731}); ">
               WorldCat
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Search catalogs from libraries across the country and around the globe.  Items owned by Trexler Library show a Muhlenberg College Library icon.  Request items not owned by Trexler Library directly through WorldCat using the ILL (Interlibrary Loan) button. Items generally take 2-10 days to arrive.
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox17497886">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="17497886">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title17497886">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Journal Articles
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content17497886">
          <div id="boxatt17497886" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link20585818">
              <a id="link_20585818" href="http://scholar.google.com" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20585818,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'The Reformation', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 19855349}); ">
               Google Scholar
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Free search engine for books and journal articles in all disciplines.Links may take you to free full text, or search the library's site for full text access.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link20585619">
              <a id="link_20585619" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.ebscohost.com/login.asp?profile=ehost&amp;defaultdb=30h" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20585619,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'The Reformation', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12329218}); ">
               Historical Abstracts with Full Text
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Provides indexing, abstracts, and selected full text of articles appearing in history journals, with emphasis on world history from 1450 to present (excluding the U.S. and Canada which are covered in America: History and Life). It includes citations to books, journal articles, and dissertations.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link20585771">
              <a id="link_20585771" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://www.jstor.org/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20585771,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'The Reformation', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12343016}); ">
               JSTOR
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               A substantive archive of more than 300 scholarly history journals, all full text. As an archive, there is typically a lag time of 3-5 years from publication until new issues appear in JSTOR. Full text journals include American Historical Review, Journal of American History, Journal of American Studies, Review in American History, Comparative Studies in Society and History, Cultural Critique, Eighteenth Century Studies, Environmental History, Historical Journal, and History and Theory.
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
     <div id="contentright" style="width:209px;float:left; padding-right:0px;">
      <div id="profile4745900" class="profile_wrapper">
      </div>
      <div id="rightboxes">
       <div id="wrapbox17497888">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="17497888">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title17497888">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Citing Sources
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content17497888">
          <div id="boxatt17497888" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link20585621">
              <a id="link_20585621" href="http://trexler.muhlenberg.edu/research/citation-guides.html" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20585621,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'The Reformation', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 20585621}); ">
               Trexler Library Citation Guides
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Brief, easy-to-use guides to the 3 most used citation styles: APA, Chicago (Turabian), MLA.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link20585622">
              <a id="link_20585622" href="http://www.zotero.org/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20585622,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'The Reformation', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 20585622}); ">
               Zotero
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Free citation tool. Does the citing for you! Loved by librarians, professors, and students alike.
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>

    </div>
    <img alt="Tip" style="top:-200px; left:-500px;" id="tippointer" src="http://lgimages.s3.amazonaws.com/tippointer.gif" />
    <div id="popupinfo" class="popup" style="visibility: visible; top:-200px; left:-500px;">
     <div class="popup_head">
      <table align="right" border="0">
       <tr>
        <td valign="bottom" height="18">
         <a href="#" onclick="return hideAlert('popupinfo')">
          <img alt="Close" src="http://lgimages.s3.amazonaws.com/window_close_grey.gif" border="0" align="absbottom" />
         </a>
        </td>
       </tr>
      </table>
      <div id="popupinfotitle" style="display:inline;">
       <h6>
        More Information
       </h6>
      </div>
     </div>
     <div class="popup_body">
      <div id="popupinfocontent" style="display:inline;">
       <img alt="Loading" src="http://lgimages.s3.amazonaws.com/indicator.gif" />
       &nbsp; Loading...
      </div>
      <br />
      <center>
       <a href="#" onclick="hideAlert('popupinfo'); return false;">
        Close
       </a>
      </center>
     </div>
    </div>
   </div>
  </div>
  <div id="dp" style="width:850px;">
   &nbsp;
  </div>
  <script type="text/javascript">
   cssdropdown.startchrome("tabs12");
  </script>
  <script type="text/javascript">
   SpringTrack.trackPage({ 
                        st_type : content_config.hitsource, 
                        _st_gid : content_config.gid 
                    });
  </script>
